import { Card, CardHeader, CardContent, Avatar, Divider, Typography, Button, CardActions } from "@material-ui/core" import bankStyle from '../bankStyle' import {openDialog} from '../../../../state/AppAction' import {useDispatch,useSelector} from 'react-redux' const BanksCard =(props)=>{ const classes = bankStyle() const accounts = props.bank.accounts const bank = props.bank const dispatch = useDispatch() const setAccount = (bank)=>{ const showData={ show:true, title:'Set your account', page: } dispatch(openDialog(showData)) } return {bank.name.charAt(0)}} /> { accounts.length>0 ? (
{`Account number: ${accounts[0].account_number}`} {`Account holder name: ${accounts[0].holder_name}`}
) : (
Account is not set yet ):
) } { accounts.length>0 ? : (null) } } export default BanksCard
